io.parallec.core.bean

Class TaskRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.parallec.core.bean.TaskRequest

  • public class TaskRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the request send to the operation worker. It contains the actual request that has been replaced if there are variables defined.
    Author:
    Yuanteng (Jeff) Pei
